title: Hospital Story:Clinic Game
description:
Join in this great hospital game and build a happy medical center. Enjoy hospital game.

Welcome to Hospital Story! Dive into the world of healthcare management and build your dreaming hospital. Fans of strategy, doctor and medical games will have endless fun with the game's unique combination of time management and medical simulation.

Game Features:
- Hundreds of game levels with unique goals and more to come, bringing you different fun
- Perfect hospital facility upgrade system, no matter how difficult the level can be easily passed;
- Treat patients around the world and bring healing and hope to the world
- Doctors from various departments will appear at the level, and you can help cure various patients professionally
- Diverse Medical Treatments: Research and utilize a vast range of medicines and equipment.
- Unique medical facilities and hospital in a variety of styles and themes.

Embark on a medical story like no other. Build, manage and design your medical center to treat various patients and relieve their suffering. Join in and experience a unique, fun and casual hospital simulator! 

Call your friends to download with you together! 

►Follow us to get news and updates：

► EmailAddress:
hospitalstory@letsfungame.com

► CompanyWebsite:
https://www.letsfungame.com
